'''1.21.4 Pre-Release 3''' (known as '''1.21.4-pre3''' in the [[launcher]]) is the third pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.21.4]], released on November 26, 2024,<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-21-4-pre-release-3|Minecraft 1.21.4 Pre-Release 3|November 26, 2024}}</ref> which fixes bugs. This is the final pre-release released in 2024.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.21.4 Pre-Release 3
|;From the 1.21.4 development versions
|277977|Teleporting large distances whilst gliding prevents the world from loading and player model glitchiness
|278444|Waterlogged resin clumps do not drop when their supporting block is broken/moved
|;From the previous development version
|278518|Player takes damage from jumping down from one block
}}</onlyinclude>
